note.p: Career: Fellow of St John's College, Cambridge; Major RAF; ex-University Lecturer at Cambridge; designer of wireless apparatus for Flying Corps, in which he did distinguished work
AssocMaterial: CSAC 7/1/74. Papers deposited in University Library, Leeds
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1971 vol 17 pp 741-756, plate, by N Feather
